rAuq why didn't you congradulate me.  I basically
stayed out of this Flame War, something I've failed to
do since I joined.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> I've been lurking around for those wondering.
> Megatron is waiting in 
> the control room for the Predacons, most of which
> are 'busy' or 
> something. I really don't have much to post about
> right now, but I 
> still have to read the posts up till when i last
> checked em.
> 
> I guess i have to stick my nose in, cause this
> obviously aint 
> getting better, it's getting worse. *raises verbal
> shields*
> 
> First think that needs to happen is a cease fire in
> this flame war 
> between cardhead, lurker, and narrator. it started
> wrong right from 
> the start. certain things which shouldn't have been
> said, were said, 
> and the replies were less than sucessful at defusing
> the situation 
> and it blew up. 
> 
> cardhead, if you don't like Narrator's posting
> style, that's your 
> problem. Telling him that you don't like it, with a
> bunch of 
> senseless slander isn't going to make him post the
> way you'd like 
> him to post.
> 
> Narrator, keep ooc comments out of your posting, if
> you want to say 
> something, say it and no pot shots. And I find it
> really hard to 
> believe that you managed to put 'piece of dog shit'
> and 'grow up' in 
> the same context.
> 
> If anyone wants to grow up, then they should shut up
> about this 
> stupid arguement, and get back to role playing.
> Nothing anyone can 
> say now short of an appologies and 'I'm being
> quiet', can show me 
> that anyone is growing up.
> 
> *preps for backlash*
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...>
> wrote:
> > BULL-FUCKING-SHIT YOU HAVE.  I'm 20 - I've been
> into Transformers 
> as 
> > long as anyone else who would have even the
> remotest interest in 
> this 
> > RPG.
> > 
> > And take that "Rookie" comment and stick it
> somewhere painful.  
> I've 
> > been roleplaying my WHOLE DAMN LIFE.
> > 
> > You got a problem with that, TOUGH LUCK.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Hollywood Narrator Countdown"
> <thecode@p...> 
> > wrote:
> > > OOC: Hey, you, you piece of dog shit. You can
> kiss my ass and 
> grow 
> > up. I didn't ask for your opinion ROOKIE. I've
> been here for since 
> > you were in diapers...
>
